electron_release_server.description: configuration for version and asset management in Electron Release Server (ERS)

base_url.description: base URL for ERS, format: http://ip.add.re.sss:port

max_defer_time_s.description: max number of seconds since a version was released that its rollout can be deferred

password.description: admin password for admin-protected routes in ERS

username.description: admin username for admin-protected routes in ERS
